message: Let's be practical, Bob. Take this offer before inflation eats away at your potential earnings.
Okay Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a more equitable split that benefits us both.  This is a good deal before inflation shrinks my share even more.
Bob, inflation is working against you. This is a fair offer, take it before it shrinks further!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's split it evenly and end this before inflation makes it pointless!
